text: $3 patron shots all year long!! Bar was super chill and has a shuffleboard. Definitely recommend if you are looking to get tipsy off patron before a night out on the town
3 dollar patron nightly, relaxed atmosphere, and a great place to start your night. Highly recommend.

This place is amazing. If you come here, you feel like everyone knows you. Grab a bite from the bakery attached and a beer from the bar. Order an Australian beer and strike up a conversation with your  bartender, and you'll find yourself already planning your next visit here.
What a great find! They have one of my favorite beers shiner bock! Had so much fun on st. Patrick's day with alex the bartender! He made the experience.
